name: aortic aneurysm or dilation
description: An enlargement of the aorta to greater than the normal size, or a ballooning of a portion of the aorta

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The anatomical region of the aortic dilation or aneurysm

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The extent of the dilation or aneurysm in relation to the normal aortic size

attributes.name: change
attributes.description: The change in size or condition of the aneurysm or dilation over time

values.name: stable
values.description: No significant change in size or condition

values.name: unchanged
values.description: No change in size or condition

values.name: increased
values.description: Increase in size or worsening condition

values.name: decreased
values.description: Decrease in size or improved condition

attributes.name: associated condition
attributes.description: The presence of other medical conditions associated with the aneurysm or dilation

values.name: calcification
values.description: Accumulation of calcium in the aortic wall

values.name: atherosclerosis
values.description: The build-up of fats, cholesterol and other substances in and on the artery walls

values.name: occlusion
values.description: The closure or blockage of a blood vessel

values.name: dissection
values.description: A tear in the inner layer of the aorta

values.name: stenosis
values.description: The abnormal narrowing of a blood vessel

values.name: pulmonary hypertension
values.description: A type of high blood pressure that affects the arteries in your lungs and the right side of your heart
